title: Contradictory claim/debunk saturation signals (reported)
summary: Public reporting describes coordinated asset reuse where AI-generated media circulated with both assertive and debunking narratives around Venezuela coverage. Summit IO records the pattern for contradiction-detector scaffolding.
findings: Reported campaigns pushed opposing interpretations using overlapping media assets, indicating contradiction saturation tactics.
Summit IO contradiction detector fixtures model shared media hashes across opposing stance clusters.
limitations: Asset hash provenance is Deferred pending dataset ingestion and hash extraction.
